title: The last trumpet: or, a six-fold Christian dialogue Viz, 1 Betweene death, the flesh, and the soule. 2 Between the Divell, the flesh, and the world. ... 6 Betweene the soule and the city of God. Translated from the elegant Latine prose of Richard Brathvvait Esquire, into English verse, by Iohn Vicars.
author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.
publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, for Robert Bostocke, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Kings Head,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
